misc: Rarely seen on the course without a drink in his hand
biography: Martin, a seasoned competitor hailing from the esteemed St. Laurence Golf club, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée. Known for his relaxed demeanor and the ever-present drink in his hand, Martin brings a unique blend of skill and levity to the competition.

With nine past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Martin's experience is undeniable. His dedication and skill have translated into one coveted Hector Trophée victory, as well as one Victor Trophy, marking him as a force to be reckoned with both individually and as part of a pair. Martin is currently preparing for his tenth appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.

Despite his casual attitude, Martin is known for his meticulous approach to the game. Opponents often underestimate his strategic mind, a mistake they soon regret. Whether he's sharing a laugh or lining up a critical putt, Martin is a true sportsman and a beloved figure among players and spectators alike.
